name: NoP: FrontLines
description:
Hello, all if you haven't read Nature of Predators this project will make little to no sense, if you have, I hope you enjoy It, it will follow the main plot from a different perspective in a future update, but for now It's just a debug map with a few enemies.

CONTROLS:

WASD/arrow keys: move

mouse: aim

LMB: shoot

CHANGELOG

v. debug pre alpha 0.0.2 gameplay test:

  • Added Mac, and LINUX support
  • Improved UI
  • Improved enemy AI
  • Added dedicated pause feature 
  • Slowed movement speed
  • changed look of bullets to be more visible
  • fixed a ton of bugs
  • Audio for shooting, getting hit, landing a hit, and moving
